attributes.additional_details:
How to put our house in order from a poor working lad!

If around half of legislature is made in EU we should reduce number of MP,s to suit
then we can pay the rest around £100,000 but with allowance instead of expenses
no second job and be born in the constituency they represent, this would stop  safe seats
for the lads.ie Tony Blair’s lad !
Also no more than two terms to stop jobs for life for the lads well mostly lads.
